original: 汝南南頓人，歷仕曹魏、西晉。善談論，以才學著稱。晉代魏後，因精通儒學，奉命與太尉荀顗共同撰定新禮。
text: Runan Nandun, Li Shi Cao Wei, Western Jin Dynasty. Be good at talking and famous for talents and learning. After the Wei Dynasty in the Jin Dynasty, due to proficient in Confucianism, he was ordered to write a new ceremony with Taiwei Xunwei.
